description: Kasen a really hot stud that our buddy Mike from the Covert Missions series recently discovered for us.Kasen (not Kaden) likes to work out, stay active and go out to the clubs. He's 24 years old and single and that's good news for us. As hot as this recruit is, I'd hate to think we had to share him with anyone else. He's 6'2' and weighs around 180 lbs. Mike is up to his old tricks of laying the bullshit on thick which is always fun to watch as it unfolds. I got so into this guy that I was really hoping that Mike had some extra special tricks up his skirt and luckily for us he does. It takes awhile for Mike to work up his nerve, but once this stud pulls off his boxers to reveal that beautiful hard dick you can just see Mike's mouth watering. And once it's at full attention, you're mouth will be watering, too. Mike assures me he's got more of this stud coming soon and I can hardly wait.
title: Kasen, Scene #01
